articles.title: HEAD LICE on ancient South American mummies contain more human DNA than a tooth - Daily Mail
articles.description: A team were able to extract the DNA from the 'cement' head lice used to glue their eggs to hairs on mummified bodies in South America, thousands of years ago.
articles.content:
Head lice found on ancient mummies contain more DNA than a tooth, according to scientists, who say it could help shed light on ancient people and migration.
A team were able to extract the DNA from … [+9065 chars]

articles.title: America’s first IVF baby Elizabeth Carr turns 40 - P.M. News
articles.description: Elizabeth Carr born on 28 December 1981 in Norfolk, Virginia, via in vitro fertilisation (IVF) is 40 years old today.
articles.content:
Elizabeth Carr born on 28 December 1981 in Norfolk, Virginia, via in vitro fertilisation (IVF) is 40 years old today.
